=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Twins
Review Date: 2018/09/02
Store: Arnold Schwarzenegger  (Actor),     Danny DeVito  (Actor),     Ivan Reitman  (Director, Producer)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Today's Deals, Spotlight Deals, Monthly Deals
Product Description: ['Superstars Arnold Schwarzenegger and Danny DeVito team up for twice the laughs in this hilarious box-office blockbuster from director Ivan Reitman (Ghostbusters). An ambitious genetic experiment takes the wrong turn when two twins - who look nothing alike - are born and then separated. Years later, the unlikely siblings meet: Julius, a highly educated but sheltered giant with a big heart, and Vincent, a pint-sized hustler with an insatiable lust for women and money. With girlfriends in tow and a hitman on their tail, the newfound brothers set off on a wild, cross-country misadventure to find their mother - but end up finding out more about themselves.Bonus Content:', 'Production Notes', 'Production Notes', 'Cast and Filmmakers', 'Cast and Filmmakers', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer']
Average Rating: 4.6

reference_summary:
The Young in Heart
Janet Gaynor  (Actor),     Douglas Fairbanks Jr.  (Actor),     Richard Wallace  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
["Having been given the bum's rush at Monte Carlo, a clan of polished grifters (Janet Gaynor, Douglas Fairbanks, Jr., Roland Young, Billie Burke) make the fortuitous acquaintance of a wealthy and lonely old widow (Minnie Dupree) during a cross-continent train trip. Their plans to insinuate themselves in her life and sponge off of her wind up crashing on shoals of unaccustomed conscience, in this winning and warm comedy. Paulette Goddard, Richard Carlson, Henry Stephenson also star. 90 min. Standard; Soundtrack: English Dolby Digital mono; Subtitles: English; theatrical trailer."]

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

The user has a well-established passion for classic cinema, particularly favoring comedies and romantic adventures that emphasize character development and transformative narratives. They consistently appreciate films featuring iconic actors, demonstrating a preference for star power and cinematic heritage. Their recent purchase of a classic comedy DVD set complements their previous acquisitions and reinforces their tendency toward feel-good entertainment. The user showcases a critical yet appreciative viewing style, reflected in their high average rating of 4.5 out of 5 for prior purchases, with their latest review earning a perfect score of 5.0 for two beloved films, indicating their enjoyment of uplifting narratives with positive resolutions.

The latest interaction highlights their ongoing enthusiasm for comedic films, particularly those featuring strong dynamic duos and humorous misadventures. Their engagement with DVD formats underscores a desire for accessible viewing experiences while emphasizing content quality. This user’s film preferences consistently gravitate towards lighthearted, nostalgic films that blend humor with heartfelt themes, further solidifying their status as a connoisseur of uplifting classic cinema. Overall, the user remains dedicated to discovering and enjoying classic films that provide both entertainment and emotional resonance.
